/* ProductDAO.selectProductList 전체 PRODUCT LIST 조회*/
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TPR.REGISTER_DT) AS ROW_NUM , TPR.PRODUCT_NUM , TPR.PRODUCT_NM /* 상품명*/ , TPR.REMAIN_QUANTITY /* 잔여수량*/ , NVL(T01.SALES_QUANTITY, 0) AS SALES_QUANTITY /* 판매수량*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE /* 가격*/ , GET_CODE_NAME('COM1004', TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD) AS PRODUCT_STATUS_NM , TPR.POST_YN /* 게시여부*/ , NVL(TPRV.VIEWS, 0) AS VIEWS /* 조회수*/ FROM T_PRODUCT TPR LEFT JOIN (SELECT TORP.PRODUCT_NUM , SUM(ORDER_QUANTITY) AS SALES_QUANTITY FROM T_ORDERED_PRODUCT TORP LEFT JOIN T_ORDER TOR ON TORP.ORDER_NUM = TOR.ORDER_NUM AND TOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD != '02' GROUP BY TORP.PRODUCT_NUM ) T01 ON TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = T01.PRODUCT_NUM LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT_VIEWS TPRV ON TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = TPRV.PRODUCT_NUM
AND TPR.POST_YN = 'Y'
and TPR.PRODUCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productNm},'%')
and TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE >= #{fromPrice} /* 시작가격만 있고 끝 가격은 없을경우*/
and TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE <= #{toPrice} /* 끝 가격만 있고 시작가격은 없을경우*/
and TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE BETWEEN #{fromPrice} AND #{toPrice}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TPR.REGISTER_DT) AS ROW_NUM , TPR.PRODUCT_NM /* 상품명*/ , TPR.REMAIN_QUANTITY /* 수량*/ , NVL(T01.ORDERED_QUANTITY, 0) AS ORDERED_QUANTITY /* 판매수량*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE /* 가격*/ , GET_CODE_NAME('COM1004', TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD) AS PRODUCT_STATUS_NM , TPR.POST_YN /* 게시여부*/ , NVL(TPRV.VIEWS, 0) AS VIEWS /* 조회수*/ FROM T_PRODUCT TPR LEFT JOIN (SELECT TORP.PRODUCT_NUM , SUM(ORDER_QUANTITY) AS ORDERED_QUANTITY FROM T_ORDERED_PRODUCT TORP LEFT JOIN T_ORDER TOR ON TORP.ORDER_NUM = TOR.ORDER_NUM AND TOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD != '02' GROUP BY TORP.PRODUCT_NUM ) T01 ON TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = T01.PRODUCT_NUM LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT_VIEWS TPRV ON TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = TPRV.PRODUCT_NUM
AND TPR.POST_YN = 'Y'
and TPR.PRODUCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productNm},'%')
and TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE >= #{fromPrice} /* 시작가격만 있고 끝 가격은 없을경우*/
and TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE <= #{toPrice} /* 끝 가격만 있고 시작가격은 없을경우*/
and TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE BETWEEN #{fromPrice} AND #{toPrice}

SELECT TPR.PRODUCT_NUM /* 상품번호*/ , TPR.USER_NUM /* 등록사용자번호*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_NM /* 상품명*/ , TPR.REGISTER_QUANTITY /* 등록수량*/ , TPR.REMAIN_QUANTITY /* 잔여수량*/ , TPR.REGISTER_QUANTITY - TPR.REMAIN_QUANTITY AS SALES_QUANTITY , TPR.PRODUCT_PRICE /* 상품가격*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD /* 판매상태코드[COM1004]*/ , GET_CODE_NAME('COM1004',TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD) AS PRODUCT_STATUS_NM /* 판매상태명[COM1004]*/ , TPR.POST_YN /* 게시여부*/ , TPRV.VIEWS /* 조회수*/ , TPR.REGISTER_DT /* 등록일자*/ , TPR.CHANGE_DT /* 수정일자*/ FROM T_PRODUCT TPR JOIN T_PRODUCT_VIEWS TPRV ON TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = TPRV.PRODUCT_NUM WHERE TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = #{productNum}

SELECT TOR.USER_NUM /*사용자번호*/ , TOR.ORDER_NUM /*오더번호*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_NUM /*상품번호*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_NM /*상품이름*/ , (TOP.PRODUCT_PRICE - TOP.DISCOUNT_PRICE) AS ORDER_PRICE /*할인 후 개당가격*/ , TOP.ORDER_QUANTITY /* 주문수량 */ , TOP.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE /*총 주문 가격*/ , TOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD /* 주문 상태코드*/ , GET_CODE_NAME('COM1005',TOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD) AS ORDER_STATUS FROM T_ORDER TOR LEFT JOIN T_ORDERED_PRODUCT TOP ON TOR.ORDER_NUM = TOP.ORDER_NUM LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT TPR ON TOP.PRODUCT_NUM = TPR.PRODUCT_NUM
TOR.USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND TPR.PRODUCT_NM IS NOT NULL
AND TPR.PRODUCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productNm}, '%')
ORDER BY TOR.REGISTER_DT DESC

/*productDAO.selectOrderedQty 판매된 수량 구하기 */ SELECT NVL(SUM(TORP.ORDER_QUANTITY),0) AS SALES_QUANTITY FROM T_ORDERED_PRODUCT TORP LEFT JOIN T_ORDER TOR ON TORP.ORDER_NUM = TOR.ORDER_NUM WHERE TORP.PRODUCT_NUM = #{productNum} AND TOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD != '02' /* 주문취소가 아닌상태*/

/* ProductDAO.selectOrderQuantity 상품 총 주문수량*/ SELECT T03.REGISTER_QUANTITY - SUM(T01.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS REMAINING_QUANTITY FROM T_ORDERED_PRODUCT T01 JOIN T_ORDER T02 ON T01.ORDER_NUM = T02.ORDER_NUM AND T02.ORDER_STATUS_CD IN ('01', '03') JOIN T_PRODUCT T03 ON T01.PRODUCT_NUM = T03.PRODUCT_NUM WHERE T01.PRODUCT_NUM = #{productNum} GROUP BY T01.PRODUCT_NUM
